data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jałoszyński, Paweł (2015): Revision of Neotropical species of ant-like stone beetles misplaced in Stenichnus and Scydmoraphes (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae). Zootaxa 4027 (2): 253-269, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4027.2.5
